name: Duplicating Adventures
description:
A game created for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. The theme being - "Out of Control"

You play as a tombstone who is trying to reach the city gates to warn the people of a zombie outbreak. The things you can't control are the zombies, the angle/direction your gun is facing and the tombstones that will duplcate when you touch them.

Beware: You lose health when you collide with another tombstone or a zombie. Can you reach the city before the zombies destroy you?

--A Game by WrathTitan
